Package org.freeplane.api

Interface ExternalObject

All Superinterfaces:
ExternalObjectRO
All Known Subinterfaces:
Proxy.ExternalObject
public interface ExternalObject extends ExternalObjectRO
External object: node.externalObject - read-write.

    Method

    Methods inherited from interface org.freeplane.api.ExternalObjectRO

    getUri, getURI, getZoom

  • Method Details

    • setUri

      void setUri(String target)
      setting null uri means remove external object. Starting with Freeplane 1.2.23 there is an additional setUri(Object) method that also accepts File, URI and URL arguments.
      Since:
      1.2

    • setFile

      void setFile(File target)
      setting null uri means remove external object.

    • setZoom

      void setZoom(float zoom)
      set to 1.0 to set it to 100%. If the node has no object assigned this method does nothing.

    • setURI

      @Deprecated void setURI(String uri)
      Deprecated.
      since 1.2 - use setUri(String) instead.
